data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 14,127,362 lost in Amhara that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Amhara, Ethiopia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Amhara. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Amhara, Ethiopia to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 7,171,499 lost people in  Amhara, Ethiopia have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Gujarati people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Amhara, Ethiopia.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Amhara.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Amhara.
